title: What are the best medical colleges in South India? - Quora

response.answer_text: There are many Medical colleges in South India. Now I will give a short list of few medical colleges Kasturba Medical College ManipalSt John's Medical college BangloreChristian Medical College VellurJawaharlal Institute of PMER PuducheryAmrita School of Medicine KochiGovt medical college KozhikodeGovt medical college TrivandrumMadras medical college ChennaiCoimbatore medical collegeDeccan college of Medical Science HyderabadKAkatiya Medical college WarangalKasturba medical college MangloreGuntur Medical collegeAndhra medical college VishakhapatnamRanga Raya medical college KakinadaYou can select any college as your wish and all the best.!

Here are few well know of them: 1. Christian Medical College, Vellore 2. Kasturba Medical College, Manipal 3. Madras Medical College, Chennai 4. JIPMER, Pondicherry 5. St. Johns Medical College, Bangalore 6. Bangalore Medical College & Research Institute, Bangalore 7. Sri Ramchandra Medical College & Res Institute (SRMC), Chennai 8. Osmania Medical College, Hyderabad 9. Amrita Institute of Medical Science & Research Centre, Kochi 10. Stanley Medical College, Chennai I hope it helps. All the best :):)
